objects.text: • 18K GOLD PLATED • CRYSTAL STUDDED • PREMIUM FINISH

product_details.name: Crystal Love Bangle Bracelet
product_details.description:
- Crystal love bangle bracelet is a glamourous and stunning piece that can add a spark to any of your outfit.
- This bangle bracelet is studded with crystals that enhances the beauty of your wrist.
- The gold plated bracelet has a smooth finish that gives it a beautiful shine.
- This cute bangle bracelet for womens is perfect for your all types of occasions.
- Looking for a perfect everyday bracelet?
- We have got you covered.
- The simple yet classy design of crystal love bangle bracelet makes it perfect for every day use.Details:Size- Free Size Plating- 18k gold tone plated Color- GoldShape- OvalMaterial- Surgical Stainless SteelLength - 6.7 cmWeight - 10 gmThickness -2.5 mmYou will receive the bracelet in a Palmonas Handcrafted Pink box.As this is a handmade product it is very rare to create identical items.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and elegant design highlighting a jewelry product. The background is a deep purple gradient with radial and circular golden decorative accents, giving it a regal feel. At the center, a detailed image of a golden crystal-studded bangle (`product_image`) draws focus. Above it, a bold heading (`heading`) in uppercase introduces the product name, followed by a stylish subheading (`subheading`) in script font denoting the product type. To the right, a golden circular tag contains the price (`price`) in a futuristic font. A description (`description`) bar below lists product highlights in bullet points. At the bottom, a gold rectangular button (`cta_background`) with black text (`cta`) prompts users to shop.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #4A1942 to #2C0A29 (gradient)
- Gold: #D4AF37
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
product_color: The product image showcases a luxurious gold bracelet adorned with embedded diamonds, exuding elegance and sophistication. The primary color is a rich metallic gold (#D4AF37), creating a warm and premium appeal. The dazzling diamonds introduce a contrasting icy white tone with shimmering silver hues (#E5E4E2), enhancing the overall brilliance. Soft reflections and highlights on the bracelet’s surface are subtly blended, maintaining a smooth, polished look while emphasizing its high-end finish. A harmonious blend of warm and cool tones makes it visually striking. For an advertisement banner, pair gold with deep charcoal gray (#333333) and ivory (#FFFFF0) for a refined, elegant theme.
